title: add live.msbuildlog.com to binary log doc
body:
### Context
We should have live.msbuildlog.com in our doc that aka.ms/msbuild/binlog points to.

### Notes
Didn't spend much time thinking on what I added. Let's suggest changes.

commit.message: add live.msbuildlog.com to binary log doc
Merge live log viewer with previous sentence

nodes.body: I'd move this up and combine it with "You can explore the contents.../)."
nodes.diffHunk:
